Articles.Content: A bit of a background for those curious: I work as a Video Production Director, I've had about 8 years experience in Animation, Motion Graphics, Editing- a whole slew of fun stuff. That being said I'm obviously a pretty big KSP fan and have always wanted to make a KSP film. This isn't what I'd call a 'professional' video by me, but really just a bit of fooling around to see what my limits were within the game. The video itself came out pretty well and I think the next video I put together will really shine! Thanks for checking out this video!
That was awesome, whish I had 10% of your editing skills

Very good job!

I love the flares!

Cheers!

Very good. The fluidity of the non-KSP sections is great. Very well matched. Nice balance in the scenes and camerawork. One suggestion might be to put something just before when the engine malfunctions. First time I saw it I wasn't sure whether the Kerbal was left floating in space or not. I gather he's supposed to be in the cockpit, but the scene just before just shows him on backpack RCS. I suggest just a pic of him grabbing the door, or perhaps a scene inside the cockpit first.
